components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: Verification Errors for German Customers During Signup

incident_updates.body: We have started seeing recovery for when German customers attempt to validate their one time passcode during the phone number verification step during signup. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 14 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have started seeing recovery for when German customers attempt to validate their one time passcode during the phone number verification step during signup. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We have started seeing recovery for when German customers attempt to validate their one time passcode during the phone number verification step during signup. We will continue to monitor to ensure a full recovery. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to investigate an error message experienced when German customers attempt to validate their one time passcode during the phone number verification step during signup. As a workaround, customers can contact Twilio support to verify and gain access to their new account. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to investigate an error message experienced when German customers attempt to validate their one time passcode during the phone number verification step during signup. As a workaround, customers can contact Twilio support to verify and gain access to their new account. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to investigate an error message experienced when German customers attempt to validate their one time passcode during the phone number verification step during signup. As a workaround, customers can contact Twilio support to verify and gain access to their new account. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue to investigate an error message experienced when German customers attempt to validate their one time passcode during the phone number verification step during signup. As a workaround, customers can contact Twilio support to verify and gain access to their new account. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently investigating an error message experienced when German customers attempt to validate their one time passcode during the phone number verification step during signup. As a workaround, customers can contact Twilio support to verify and gain access to their new account. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are currently investigating an error message experienced when German customers attempt to validate their one time passcode during the phone number verification step during signup. As a workaround, customers can contact Twilio support to verify and gain access to their new account. Our engineers are working on the issue, and we will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.
We've become aware of a potential issue with Console sign up. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

incident_updates.body: The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 20 July 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 20 July 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Beeline Russia handsets.

The T-Mobile network in the US is conducting an emergency maintenance from 20 July 2023 at 18:00 PDT until 21 July 2023 at 04:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from T-Mobile US handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Italy Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Wind (Tre)

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Wind (Tre) Italy is conducting a planned maintenance from 22 July 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 23 July 2023 at 02:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Wind (Tre) Italy customers.

Impacted Products: Lookup SIM Swap, Verify Silent Network Authentication (SNA), Lookup Identity Match

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

scheduled_maintenances.name: France SMS Carrier Maintenance - Bouygues Telecom

incident_updates.body: The Bouygues Telecom network in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 July 2023 at 14:00 PDT until 24 July 2023 at 20:00 PDT.During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from France Bouygues Telecom handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Germany and Austria Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Germany and Austria is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 July 2023 at 17:00 PDT until 24 July 2023 at 17:30 PDT. During the maintenance window there could be intermittent call failures to a subset of Germany and Austria phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 July 2023 at 17:00 PDT until 24 July 2023 at 17:30 PDT. During the maintenance window there could be intermittent call failures to a subset of United Kingdom phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - U.S. Cellular

incident_updates.body: The U.S. Cellular network in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 July 2023 at 21:30 PDT until 25 July 2023 at 03:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from U.S. Cellular US handsets.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

incident_updates.body: The Legos network in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 July 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 24 July 2023 at 23:00 PDT.  During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Legos France handsets.

Our Voice carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 24 July 2023 at 22:00 PDT until 24 July 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures to and from France handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: France Voice and SMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice and SMS carrier partner in France is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 July 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 25 July 2023 at 18:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call failures to and from a subset of Twilio's France phone numbers and intermittent SMS delays delivering to and from France handsets via a subset of France longcodes.

scheduled_maintenances.name: US SMS Carrier Maintenance - Small US Carriers

incident_updates.body: A subset of small US networks in the US is conducting a planned maintenance from 25 July 2023 at 21:00 PDT until 26 July 2023 at 01:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from small US Carriers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Long Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Short Code, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: US and Canada SMS and MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our SMS and MMS carrier partner in the US and Canada is conducting planned maintenance from 26 July 2023 at 20:00 PDT until 27 July 2023 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS and MMS to and from US and Canada handsets via Toll-free numbers.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Toll-Free, North America
CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Toll-Free, North America

scheduled_maintenances.name: Germany Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Deutsche Telekom

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Deutsche Telekom is conducting a planned maintenance from 27 July 2023 at 16:00 PDT until 27 July 2023 at 21:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Deutsche Telekom customers.

Impacted Products: Silent Network Authentication (SNA), Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

incident_updates.body:
Our Voice carrier partner in Japan is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 21 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 11 September 2023 at 11:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects and failures to and from Twilio Japan phone numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

21 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 21 August 2023 at 07:00 PDT

22 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 22 August 2023 at 07:00 PDT
22 August 2023 at 08:00 PDT until 22 August 2023 at 09:00 PDT

28 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 28 August 2023 at 07:00 PDT
28 August 2023 at 08:00 PDT until 28 August 2023 at 09:00 PDT

29 August 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 29 August 2023 at 07:00 PDT
29 August 2023 at 08:00 PDT until 29 August 2023 at 09:00 PDT

04 September 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 04 September 2023 at 07:00 PDT
04 September 2023 at 08:00 PDT until 04 September 2023 at 09:00 PDT

05 September 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 05 September 2023 at 07:00 PDT
05 September 2023 at 08:00 PDT until 05 September 2023 at 09:00 PDT

11 September 2023 at 06:00 PDT until 11 September 2023 at 07:00 PDT
11 September 2023 at 08:00 PDT until 11 September 2023 at 09:00 PDT
11 September 2023 at 10:00 PDT until 11 September 2023 at 11:00 PDT

scheduled_maintenances.name: Czech Republic Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in the Czech Republic is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 October 2023 at 16:30 PDT until 02 October 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects for calls to a subset of Twilio Czech Republic phone numbers.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three UK

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.
Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our carrier partner Three UK is conducting an emergency maintenance from 19 July 2023 at 17:00 PDT until 21 July 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three UK customers between 18:30 PDT to 01:00 PDT on both days.
Impacted Products: Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match
